channel.title: Digital Transformation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Transformation on FinanClub

item.title: INFY
item.description: score:825 Chances: Infosys benefits from strong demand for cloud, data analytics, IoT, and security products amid the ongoing digital transformation wave. Optimism returns for India’s IT companies as easing odds of a US recession and the emergence of AI as a revenue source drive a rebound in stocks.

item.title: MSFT
item.description: score:1004 Chances: Microsoft is seeking to patent a ‘high-sensitivity’ facial recognition technology, indicating the company’s focus on innovative advancements. Rising corporate spending on digital transformation projects has positively impacted CRM stock, with completed merger synergies from the Slack deal being a key driver.
